items.sentence: Tom drives the old car that his grandfather gave him.
The woman that Tom married is even fatter than he is.
Tom saw something in the store that he wanted to buy.
It was very difficult to continue what we were doing.
Were you going to the railway station when I saw you?
Are you sure that we're going in the right direction?
I don't think that reading novels is a waste of time.
I've already told Tom he won't be allowed to do that.
Tom has been painting for as long as he can remember.
How would you feel if Tom told you that he loved you?
